note:
author of BUT HOW ARE YOU, REALLY, coming in 2024 from Dutton Books/PRH. sex & culture critic. survivor. queer. 

social media strategist for companies including TED Talks, Caveat NYC, Harvest, Tommy. comms volunteer alum for Clinton 2016, Warren 2020. 

I care about: feminist issues, domestic violence + sexual violence, sexuality and intimacy, worker's rights in tech and media industries, online harassment, representation and identity in pop culture, and shit posting.
